review.summary: Clean __init__.py file for the events domain entities module. Properly exports Event and EventMetadata classes with explicit __all__ list following neo-commons conventions. Code is minimal, focused, and follows all project standards.

positive_observations.observation: Follows neo-commons __init__.py pattern with comprehensive __all__ list for explicit public API control
Clean imports using relative paths following project convention (from .event import Event)
Proper module documentation with clear purpose statement
Minimal and focused - exactly what an __init__.py should be
Consistent naming conventions for exported entities

context.tests: No tests needed for __init__.py module - exports only
context.documentation: Contains clear module docstring explaining purpose
